page.title: 12N.MOOR FARM-STOCK-PIGS (con)
page.content:
{Stock (continued):- b). PIGS (continued) Artificial Insemination is used partly to obtain pure strain of breeding females
This gives 2.5 litters per sow per year averaging 10.5 pigs born per litter and 10 pigs reared per litter
FEED:- The total cost of feed Â£3,500+ per week. All concentrates are bought from feed mills. e.g.BOCM, Selby. They are transported by bulk lorries and blown into feed hoppers. There is an automatic feeding system in operation in the growing and finishing pens.
